info.name: Gitea Service - GraphQL API Tests
info.description: Complete test collection for the Gitea GraphQL service with all queries and mutations

graphql.query:
query GetRepository($owner: String!, $name: String!) {
  getRepository(owner: $owner, name: $name) {
    id
    name
    fullName
    description
    private
    htmlUrl
    cloneUrl
    sshUrl
    defaultBranch
    starsCount
    forksCount
    watchersCount
    openIssuesCount
    size
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    owner {
      login
      fullName
      avatarUrl
    }
  }
}

graphql.variables:
{
  "owner": "{{testOwner}}",
  "repo": "{{testRepo}}",
  "title": "New feature implementation",
  "body": "This PR implements a new feature",
  "head": "feature/new-feature",
  "base": "main"
}
